name: UIDropInteraction
desc: An interaction to enable dropping of items onto a view, employing a delegate to instantiate objects and respond to calls from the drop session.

items.name: init(delegate: UIDropInteractionDelegate)
items.desc: Initializes a drop interaction object with a custom delegate object.

items.name: var delegate: UIDropInteractionDelegate?
items.desc: An object that configures and controls a drop interaction.

items.name: protocol UIDropInteractionDelegate
items.desc: The interface for configuring and controlling a drop interaction.

items.name: var allowsSimultaneousDropSessions: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether the drop interaction handles more than one simultaneous drop session.
